body: Ive been on this site for so long that i didnt even whip it out after seeing the cover. I knew this would be an entertaining read lol.

Think this is a new adaptation of the manhwa called SStudy which already ended. The art here is TIERS better than the original. Just be prepared for some drama. If not, get the load out and run away fast
Also wondering if there are any good webtoons sites. They're usually a few chapters behind here but every other site I've seen with webtoons end up with 5 billion popups and ads
I came here to fap but bruh, this shit is interesting
disappointed that mc didnt notice that his friend likes him
@RoboBomberman: I use toonily.com and webtoon.xyz (pretty much almost the same content) for friendly reading, or if you also want raw but some annoying popups, you can also try manga18.club
With all these webtoons showing up, I am starting to wonder. Is there a good website to read them? Or do I just try with a regular manga website
no no, he's got a point.
i used to hate this kind of story because of 'ntr' but since she hasnt done to to anyone at that group currently ill stick with the story... also Beautiful women are really dangerous theyre scary
